characters.name: Amber
characters.mainBuild1Desc: An AoE build that reloads additional ammo after casting a skill, enhancing Auto Attack DMG.
characters.mainBuild2Desc: An AoE build that enhances skills, allowing them to be cast consecutively.
characters.supportBuild1Desc: A sustained DPS build that extends skill duration and generates Shadows.
characters.supportBuild2Desc: A burst DPS build that allows skills to quickly deal DMG multiple times.

potentials.name: Dominant Firepower
potentials.descShort: After casting the Main Skill, increases Magazine Capacity and Auto Attack DMG.
potentials.descLong: After casting Fireworks Jam (Main Skill), immediately reloads 36 rounds in the magazine. Increases Auto Attack DMG by &Param1& before the magazine is depleted.

potentials.name: Bullet Storm
potentials.descShort: After casting the Main Skill, Auto Attacks become AoE Attacks.
potentials.descLong: After casting Fireworks Jam (Main Skill), immediately fully reloads the magazine. Auto Attacks become AoE Attacks before the magazine is depleted, and deal &Param1& of ATK as AoE Ignis DMG.

potentials.name: Precise Temperature Control
potentials.descShort: After casting the Main Skill, can immediately cast again.
potentials.descLong: Within 2s after casting Fireworks Jam (Main Skill), can immediately cast again. When Fireworks Jam triggers an Ignis Mark: Sacred Flame, casting the Skill again increases its DMG by &Param1&.

potentials.name: Echo of Hospitality
potentials.descShort: When the Main Skill hits a target, deals extra AoE DMG.
potentials.descLong: When Fireworks Jam (Main Skill) hits a target, deals an additional &Param1& of ATK as AoE Ignis Skill DMG. This effect can only be triggered 5 times/s.

potentials.name: Greed Gunfire
potentials.descShort: When Amber lands multiple Crit Hits, increases Auto Attack DMG.
potentials.descLong: When Amber lands &Param4& Crit Hits, immediately fully reloads the magazine, and increases Auto Attack DMG by &Param1& for &Param2&s. This effect can only be triggered once every &Param3&s.

potentials.name: Ardent Trigger
potentials.descShort: Each time Amber deals Auto Attack DMG, increases her &Param2&.
potentials.descLong: Each time Amber deals Auto Attack DMG, increases her &Param2& by &Param1&. This effect can stack up to &Param3& times and resets upon reloading.

potentials.name: Confident Mode
potentials.descShort: After casting the Main Skill, Amber gains Super Armor, increasing ATK SPD and &Param4&.
potentials.descLong: After casting Fireworks Jam (Main Skill), Amber gains Super Armor, increasing ATK SPD by &Param1& and &Param4& by &Param2& for &Param3&s.

potentials.name: Weakness Mark
potentials.descShort: After casting the Main Skill, increases &Param4&.
potentials.descLong: After casting Fireworks Jam (Main Skill), increases &Param4& by &Param1& for &Param2&s, up to &Param3& stacks.

potentials.name: Grand Finale
potentials.descShort: Increases Main Skill DMG and deals additional damage.
potentials.descLong: Increases the DMG of Fireworks Jam (Main Skill) by &Param1&, and the Skill shoots 2 extra rounds.

potentials.name: Spectacular Finale
potentials.descShort: When the Main Skill kills a target with Ignis Mark: Sacred Flame, increases the next Main Skill's DMG.
potentials.descLong: Every time Fireworks Jam (Main Skill) kills a target with Ignis Mark: Sacred Flame, the next time when Amber casts the Main Skill, increases &Param3& by &Param1&, up to &Param2& stacks.

Amber can dodge one more time.
When Amber deals DMG to an elite or boss target, increases her ATK.
potentials.descLong: Amber can dodge one more time. When Amber deals DMG to an elite or boss target, increases her ATK by &Param1& for &Param2&s. This effect can only be triggered once every &Param3&s.

potentials.name: Blazing Waltz

potentials.descLong: Increases Amber's ATK by &Param1& while she is moving.

potentials.name: Keen Accent
potentials.descShort: When Amber lands a Crit Hit on a target with Ignis Mark: Sacred Flame, increases her ATK.
potentials.descLong: When Amber lands a Crit Hit on a target with Ignis Mark: Sacred Flame, increases her ATK by &Param1& for &Param2&s, stacking up to &Param3& times.

potentials.descLong: While casting Bullet Waltz (Support Skill), Amber follows the target, dealing &Param1& of ATK as Ignis Skill DMG for 6s.

potentials.descShort: When casting the Support Skill, increases Amber's &Param4&.

potentials.name: Blazing Dance
potentials.descShort: After casting the Support Skill, increases Amber's &Param4&.
potentials.descLong: After casting Bullet Waltz (Support Skill), increases Amber's &Param4& by &Param1& for &Param2&s, up to &Param3& stacks.

potentials.descShort: When Amber hits a target with Ignis Mark: Sacred Flame, increases her &Param3&.
potentials.descLong: Each time Amber hits a target with Ignis Mark: Sacred Flame, increases her &Param3& by &Param1&, stacking up to &Param2& times. This effect can only be triggered once every 2s. Resets after casting her Ultimate.

potentials.name: Trajectory Enhancement
potentials.descShort: Increases Amber's &Param2&.
potentials.descLong: Increases Amber's &Param2& by &Param1&.

potentials.name: Pressure Amp
potentials.descShort: Increases Amber's &Param2&.
potentials.descLong: Increases Amber's &Param2& by &Param1&.

potentials.name: Thermal Sync
potentials.descShort: Increases Ignis Trekkers' &Param2&.
potentials.descLong: Increases all Ignis Trekkers' &Param2& by &Param1&.

potentials.name: Bursting Spark
potentials.descShort: After casting the Ultimate, increases Amber's &Param3&.
potentials.descLong: After casting Spark of Finality (Ultimate), increases Amber's &Param3& by &Param1& for &Param2&s.

potentials.name: Overloaded Spark
potentials.descShort: Casting an Ultimate resets Skill Cooldown. After the Ultimate ends, reduces Amber's Skill Cooldown and increases &Param3&.
potentials.descLong: Casting Spark of Finality resets Skill Cooldown. Within &Param1&s after the Ultimate ends, reduces Amber's Skill Cooldown by 50% and increases &Param3& by &Param2&.

potentials.descLong: Within &Param1&s after Amber hit but didn't kill a target with Spark of Finality (Ultimate), increases her Ignis DMG dealt to the target by &Param2&. If she kills the target during this period, gains &Param3& Energy.

disks.desc:
Here lies the gateway to the Inferno.
It leads straight to the abyss of sin.
I wait by the riverbank, illuminating your sorrowful journey ahead,
blessing you to plunge into my eternal love.

disks.desc:
You skillfully push open the door,
And her pristine wings bring solace to your aching heart.
Together, you share a serene silence, a peaceful bond just between the two of you.
You know that her silence is her ultimate compassion towards you.
And your visit is the sole redemption she can ever hope for.

skills.name: Angel's Prayer
skills.desc: Increases the Ultimate DMG of Lux Trekkers in the squad by &Param1&. At the start of battle, Lux Trekkers in the squad restore &Param2& Energy.

disks.name: Holiday Bubble
disks.desc:
"Hey, regular! Good to see ya! Your usual?"
"Huh? This seat's for toddlers only?"
"Eh, rules are made to be broken, right? Nobody's watching anyway!"
"Zoning out is adult paradise!"

Perfect vacation goals right here!
Resting on the register, she savors a dream, tart and sweet.

skills.name: Call of Holiday

disks.name: Sweet Invitation
disks.desc:
O little bunny,
close your eyes and drift to sleep,
I'll cradle you in the arms of the night;

O little bunny,
rest your head and dream sweetly,
I promise you the sweetest treat of all.

skills.name: Forbidden Nectar

disks.name: Vent It Out
disks.desc:
"La-la-lawelcome home, Master! "
"Whether it's the weariness in your heart or the misfortune at your side,"
"I will personally help you sweep all that nasty trash away!"
"Let me turn my energy into your magic! "
"Heaven's cutest maid, Beatrixa, at your service! "

With a clear, lively voice and an impossibly cute demeanor,
she gave her all every day
to deliver healing and hope to her fans across the Nova Continent.

disks.name: Meowing Cat God
disks.desc:
Humans are born alone.
Only in the heat of battle do we truly feel alive.
Huh? Cool guys don't look at explosions? Fine, I heard you

Like flower petals, your departing form dissolves,
Beneath starlit nights, our vows still warm my palm,
These perfumed days bring thoughts of you, despite my own will.

The blossoms drift in rainy haze,
That flowered in bright sunny days.
A rainbow's gleam within my hand
Could such beauty ever stay?

disks.desc:
The witch stands proud, head held high,
Granting honey, venom, and love divine.
You who failed to choose your princess right,
Embrace this cruel pleasure, and dance with me tonight?

They set the rules of right and wrong,
but if you loathe these bindings, rise as a midnight knight.
Even if bloodied and broken, we're staying true to who we are!
To those arrogant jerks:
"See this mighty fist?"
"After the clock strikes twelve, this is our domain!"

Only one day of food left. Our wallets are empty. The Oasis's Grace is running low...
We've staked everything on this Monolith commission...
Still, when it's time for the group photo, don't forget to smile!

We beseech Thee, have mercy; heed our plea.
Goddess, do the cries of mortals reach Thine ears?
...
Each word finds Me, finds Us all.
We shall guide humanity towards its glorious destiny.

Before looking back at the start, what seemed the end was just
the start of a new chapter.
Are you happy as you've always dreamed you'd be?
Let's meet again tomorrow.

On United Harvest's grand design, Philae stands as just a single point.
From here, I shall draw a perfect circle, claiming the entire Nova.
Follow me. Pledge loyalty. March ever onward.

"First, we need a ship, then courage, and lastly, faith."
The adventurer pinned the map
While whitecaps rage from point to point
Wild waters crash and beckon towards mysteries
She waits for kindred souls to sail.

Like a human life, fireworks bloom, flourish, and fade
brief yet brilliant, leaving their unique mark across the night sky.
It's much like a Trekker's endless quest to climb the Monolith,
all for that one day when they might finally hold the stars in their hands...

disks.name: Lemon & Black Tea

With guilt my heart was heavy worn, to heal the bridge that had been torn.
Thought friendship's door was closed for good,
Till here we sit, just as we should.
New dcor graces these old walls, new packages the sweet food calls.
One drink runs hot, one drink runs cold,
Same taste remains from days of old.

disks.desc:
Kasimira, are you ready?
This is round 37 and our final match for today.

Too bad, just one shot shy.
If that shot had landed, you'd have had me beat.
Chaton, your hand wavered at the critical moment.

Just the thought of besting you gets my adrenaline pumping!
Let's do it again!

Rack the gun, we've got the next commission to prep for.

Looks like Chaton's challenge isn't over yet.

disks.name: Sparkling Moment

"Uneventful days aren't worth recording."
"Dull little things aren't worth recording."
"Repetitive work isn't worth recording."
But...are they truly worthless?
A teammate's reminder before you head out, the wrong turn you took, the smiles and thanks you received...
These ordinary fragments of memory condense into tiny points of light.
Even if the paper turns yellow with time, the brilliance of each day will never be forgotten.

disks.name: United by Fate
disks.desc:
Friends, companions...whatever the name, they all embody the same group of souls united by fate. They converge when the threads of fate intertwine, and disperse when they unwind.
What we can do is cherish every fleeting moment of this reunion, laughing and playing with all our hearts, and etching those precious memories deep into our hearts.
And as the hour of parting draws near, we cling to the hope of a future encounter, anticipating the day we shall meet again.

Behold, something looms in the dark.
Listen closely, do you hear those footsteps echoing?
Odd, a sudden shiver runs down my spine.

A faulty projector, an unknown film reel, and eerie visuals flickering...
A Trekker's camp at midnight, an uninvited guest, and an unexpected visitor.
"Meow"
The silence envelops all. You close the door, but it has already slipped inside.

disks.name: Colors Pierce the Grey

We had to take a day off now and then.
Escape the gang fights and the daily grind,
step out under a clear sky, and spray paint a rainbow of our own across it.

Damp hair clung to her back.
Her clothes were a mess, yet the air was stiflingly still.
Carrying a heavy heart, even the falling petals seemed to weigh her down.
As the rain fell endlessly, your silhouette began to blur.

Brush and ink are her weapons.
On the stretched rice paper,
She weaves her magic, each brushstroke dancing in unconventional places.
This is her realm, a world of enchantment solely under her command.

A petal without a name or number
drifts into the silent garden,
carrying a blush of crimson and a vision of pure white,
settling into a golden specimen, alongside a vanished dream.

The girl burst in with the afternoon sun,
bringing with her the aroma of snacks.
Fries? Grilled fish? Or a loaf of fluffy, warm bread?
You had to grab something
to enjoy this stolen moment of peace.

An alarm blared as blade met axe.
The cage shattered, and she plunged into the abyss.
Through the crimson rain, she met your eyes.

Facts captured.
Photos printed.
Story broadcast.
Welcome to the witches' Dream Factory of Truth!

Ah, welcome to my ball, my dear patient.
Listen, the music is playing. Come, dance with my collection among these phantom bubbles.

skills.name: Buried Past
skills.desc: When the target is killed, if the main Trekker is inflicted with Boulder, increases Terra squadmates' ATK by &Param1& for &Param2&s, stacking up to &Param3& times.

disks.name: The Lost Pilgrim
disks.desc:
Body bound, soul eroded,
even pain masquerades as a mire of salvation.
The fallen priestess still wanders
on a pilgrimage with no answers and no end,
awaiting a righteous one to grant her release.

skills.name: The Lost Pilgrim
skills.desc: Increases the squad's Terra DMG by &Param1&. When any Trekker triggers Terra Mark, increases the main Terra Trekker's Skill & Auto Attack DMG by &Param2& for &Param3&s.

skills.name: Iron Love Embrace
skills.desc: Increases Terra Trekkers' ATK by &Param1&. When any Terra Trekker deals Skill DMG, if a support Terra Trekker is on the battlefield, increases the Skill DMG by &Param2&.

skills.name: Prison of Passion
skills.desc: When any Trekker triggers Terra Mark, increases Terra squadmates' ATK by &Param1& for &Param2&s, stacking up to &Param3& times.

disks.name: Claw the Claw
disks.desc:
The children of the Ash District tell a legend:
when despair grips the world and tears loved ones apart,
a green-haired heroine called the "Lord of the Prize Claw" and her brave companions
will lead everyone to catch the last glimmer of hope and reunite with their families.

skills.name: Claw the Claw
skills.desc: Increases the squad's Terra DMG by &Param1&. When a target's Terra Mark is triggered, the target takes &Param2& more Terra DMG for &Param3&s.

skills.name: Lucky Clip
skills.desc: When any Terra Trekker restores HP, increases the squad's Terra DMG by &Param1& for &Param2&s.

skills.name: Record Breaker
skills.desc: When a support Trekker deals Skill DMG, increases Terra squadmates' Skill DMG by &Param1& for &Param2&s, stacking up to &Param3& times.

disks.name: Ripples of Nostalgia
disks.desc:
Floating on a thousand crests,
a translucent, shimmering thing.
Escaping the searing summer heat,
drifting along with the migrating fish.

skills.name: Ripples of Nostalgia
skills.desc: Increases the squad's Lux DMG by &Param1&. When the main Lux Trekkers deals Ultimate DMG to a target, the target takes &Param2& more Lux DMG for &Param3&s, stacking up to &Param4& times.

skills.name: Dance of Shimmers
skills.desc: Increases the main Lux Trekker's Auto Attack and Skill DMG by &Param1&. When the main Lux Trekker deals Skill DMG, increases this effect by an additional &Param2& for &Param3&s.

skills.name: Gleaming Steps
skills.desc: After the main Lux Trekker deals Skill DMG &Param1& times in total, increases the squad's Lux DMG by &Param2& for &Param3&s.

disks.name: Summer Sanctuary
disks.desc:
I long for the sea breeze to linger, for the waves to remain.
I pray for the sunset to stretch endlessly, for the starlight to never fade.
I wish to share with you alonea summer that belongs to us.

skills.name: Summer Sanctuary
skills.desc: Increases the main Lux Trekker's Auto Attack & Skill DMG by &Param1&. If any Trekker triggers Lux Mark while the main Lux Trekker's Ultimate is active, increases the squad's Lux DMG by &Param2& for &Param3&s, stacking up to &Param4& times.

skills.name: Azure Horizon
skills.desc: Increases Lux Trekkers' Skill DMG by &Param1&. When any Lux Trekker casts a skill, increases this effect by an additional &Param2& for &Param3&s, stacking up to &Param4& times.

skills.name: Infinite Sunshine
skills.desc: When any Lux Trekker deals Skill DMG, the main Lux Trekker gains 1 stack of Diffraction, stacking up to &Param1& times. When the main Lux Trekker casts a skill, increases Lux squadmates' Skill DMG by the number of Diffraction stacks x&Param2& for &Param3&s, and removes all the Diffraction stacks.

disks.name: Fist of Courage
disks.desc:
To protect your companions, to summon the courage and become your best self,
strike your fist at the colossal enemy,
and clear the path to a future full of hope.

skills.name: Fist of Courage
skills.desc: The main Ignis Trekker gains 1 stack of Courage when dealing Ultimate DMG, increasing Ultimate DMG by &Param1& for &Param3&s, stacking up to &Param2& times.

skills.name: Passion of the Captain
skills.desc: Increases the Skill DMG of Ignis Trekkers in the squad by &Param1&. When an Ignis Trekker deals Skill DMG, increases Ignis Trekkers' ATK by &Param2& for &Param3&s.

skills.name: Inspiration of Courage
skills.desc: When the duration of Courage ends, each stack of Courage increases the main Ignis Trekker's Auto Attack DMG by &Param1& and grants &Param2& DEF for &Param3&s.
